item.title: Visual studio 2013 Update 4 and SharePoint full trust solutions automated build
item.description: Quick update on my serie about automated build for sharepoint full trust solutions. If you take a look at the second error Iâ€™m describing hereyou will notice that you have to replace two lines in order to make it work. With update 4 it looks like Microsoft is preparing full 64 bits support for visual studio. New fix lines are now <Import Condition=”‘$(Language)’ == ‘C#'” Project="$(MSBuildExtensionsPath32)\Microsoft\Windows Workflow Foundation\v3.5\Workflow.Targets” /> <Import Condition=”‘$(Language)’ == ‘VB’” Project="$(MSBuildExtensionsPath32)\Microsoft\Windows Workflow Foundation\v3.
